permafrost.tundra.math

Class BigIntegerHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • permafrost.tundra.math.BigIntegerHelper

  • public class BigIntegerHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    A collection of convenience methods for working with integers.

    • Field Summary

      The default radix used by methods in this class.

      • shift

        public static java.math.BigInteger shift(java.math.BigInteger integer,
                                         int distance)
        Returns a BigInteger whose value is shifted by the given distance. The shift distance when positive performs a left shift and when negative performs a right shift.
        Parameters:
        integer - The integer to be shifted.
        distance - The distance to shift the integer.
        Returns:
        The given integer shifted the given distance, left if distance is positive, and right if distance is negative.

      • validate

        public static boolean validate(java.lang.String integer,
                               boolean raise)
                        throws com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException
        Returns true if the given string can be parsed as a integer number.
        Parameters:
        integer - The string to validate.
        raise - True if an exception should be thrown if the string is not a valid integer number.
        Returns:
        True if the string can be parsed as a integer number, otherwise false.
        Throws:
        com.wm.app.b2b.server.ServiceException - If raise is true and the given string is not a valid integer number.

        Returns true if the given string can be parsed as a integer number.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        True if the string can be parsed as a integer number, otherwise false.
